channel.title: Journal on The Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on The Garden

item.title: Low Power Mode for Humans
item.description: We deal with burnout, too, and need to recharge our batteries. We can’t all take vacations or mental health days, but we can leverage an idea from phones: low power mode. We can’t go full speed all the time, much though we’d like. Here’s what my essentials were, and I found it helpful to define what things weren’t, too. Have to: Going to work Cleaning yourself Sleep Water Being there for your people Meet deadlines Nice to do:
